posts.postText:
What if you could buy traitor/detective from the store for like 10 points

I get ridiculously long inno streaks and this could ease the pain

It wouldn't add another traitor, it would just make it so that only 3/4 traitors could be randomed

I'm LoLing not that much, but i am SC2ing alot :D

Well that aside.... this idea is ridiculously stupid.

^ With the 2 lines above going aside.... I LOL SO HARD if inferno is the ONLY one that votes YES. XD

1: buy traitor for a round
2: get 5 or more kills
3: Repeat indefinitely
4: Profit.
Blah. They have on other servers.

On those servers they have 'Loyalty points'' which are gay. Then soon after they die they rage nd shit because someone supposedly rdmed him while having a knife out.
Terrible idea is still terrible.
